short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extracts all links on the current page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the Link Extractor - your go-to tool for effortlessly gathering all links present on any webpage. 

With its intuitive functionality, Link Extractor simplifies the process of obtaining comprehensive lists of links from the current page, empowering users to efficiently navigate through web content. 

No longer will you need to manually scour through pages to collect URLs. Link Extractor automates this task, swiftly capturing all links with precision and ease. 

Whether you're a researcher compiling resources, a developer analyzing website structure, or simply a curious explorer seeking to catalog interesting finds, Link Extractor streamlines your workflow, saving you valuable time and effort. 

Experience the convenience and efficiency of Link Extractor today, and unlock a world of seamless link extraction at your fingertips.

In our latest release - we offering new interface and functionality to download links on csv and txt files.

Disclosure: This extension uses the Amazon affiliate program to generate revenue. By using this extension, you help support its development and maintenance.
